qoutes.text: You have always been a source of strength and support for me. I'm glad that you're a part of my life
You make me smile so easily. Can you be there, to do it forever?
I choose you. And I'll choose you over and over and over. Without pause, without a doubt, in a heartbeat. I'll keep choosing you.
Your absence is stronger to me than the presence of thousands of other people
I fell in love with you not for how you look, just for who you are

propose.text: When I say I love you more, I don’t mean I love you more than you love me. I mean I love you more than the bad days ahead of us, I love you more than any fight we will ever have. I love you more than the distance between us, I love you more than any obstacle that could try and come between us. I love you the most...❤️
propose.subtext: That's all I will wait for your reply
